Sentencas: Marine transportation facilitates the transportation of fuels and goods over long distances cost-effectively, but their environmental impact has increased due to the utilization of fossil fuels.
Titulo: Investigation of a hybridized combined cycle engine with SOFC system for marine applications

Sentencas: This paper presents a new marine engine design comprising a steam Rankine cycle, gas Brayton cycle, and solid oxide fuel cell to replace a two-stroke internal combustion engine.
Titulo: Investigation of a hybridized combined cycle engine with SOFC system for marine applications

Sentencas: Hydrogen, methane, dimethyl ether, ethanol, and methanol are selected as eco-friendly fuels.
Titulo: Investigation of a hybridized combined cycle engine with SOFC system for marine applications

Sentencas: This hybrid combined engine is attached to a multi-effect desalination unit to take the advantage of waste energy from the exhaust gases.
Titulo: Investigation of a hybridized combined cycle engine with SOFC system for marine applications

Sentencas: The engine is thermodynamically analyzed using the Aspen Plus software to assess its performance energetically and exergetically.
Titulo: Investigation of a hybridized combined cycle engine with SOFC system for marine applications

Sentencas: It is found that the engine's total power is increased by 40% to an average of 15,546 kW with average thermal and exergetic efficiencies of 61% and 43%, respectively.
Titulo: Investigation of a hybridized combined cycle engine with SOFC system for marine applications

Sentencas: The maximum power reaches 16,780 kW with maximum carbon emission reductions of 53% and a minimum specific fuel consumption of 337 g kWh(-1) which is a reduction of 17%.
Titulo: Investigation of a hybridized combined cycle engine with SOFC system for marine applications

Sentencas: In addition, the waste energy is used to deliver 20.3 kg s(-1) freshwater by desalinating seawater.
Titulo: Investigation of a hybridized combined cycle engine with SOFC system for marine applications

Sentencas: The proposed engine system has better performance and less environmental impact, which makes it a better choice than traditional engines.
Titulo: Investigation of a hybridized combined cycle engine with SOFC system for marine applications
